tool_description: Check the DnD status of any mobile phone in India
name: Free DND India
title: Free DND India

api_list.name: /dnd.php?action=dnd&id={cell_phone_number}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rajr-free-dnd-india-v1.p.rapidapi.com/dnd.php?action=dnd&id=9999999999"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rajr-free-dnd-india-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
